TopicTitle: Reapers Dutch Designs (a new serie's featuring syfy craft replica's) 2e entrie: orca 24-05-15

Articles.Content:
hey guys this is a start of a new serie's in where i showcase syfy replica crafts i build using mods.

the first craft in the serie's is a remake of the swatkats turbokat.

![lAoisi4.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/lAoisi4.jpg)

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/nsERaa5oV0s?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

the plane craftfile:

[http://www./download/i2ayp04d8t1aiaz/turbo_kat.craft](http://www./download/i2ayp04d8t1aiaz/turbo_kat.craft)

the bike craftfile:

[http://www./download/ccl4vebcxuz8nvp/turboKat_bike.craft](http://www./download/ccl4vebcxuz8nvp/turboKat_bike.craft)

the second craft in the the serie's is the Orca (from the command & conquer game serie's)

![JMItN8U.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/JMItN8U.jpg)

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/h0H1jLtA2u4?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

the craft file:

[http://www./download/wf2n361d67c8z8b/orca_mk_1.craft](http://www./download/wf2n361d67c8z8b/orca_mk_1.craft)

the mods used in this serie's can befound here:

Infernal Robotics parts:

[http://kerbal.curseforge.com/ksp-mods/220267-magic-smoke-industries-infernal-robotics/files](http://kerbal.curseforge.com/ksp-mods/220267-magic-smoke-industries-infernal-robotics/files)

infernal robotics Model Rework (for beter looking parts):

[http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/65365](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/65365)

tweakescale ( lets you change the size of a part)

[http://kerbal.curseforge.com/ksp-mods/220549-tweakscale/files](http://kerbal.curseforge.com/ksp-mods/220549-tweakscale/files)

bd armory:

[http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/85209-1-0-BDArmory-v0-8-2-%28AI-pilots-smarter-guards-etc%29-Dev-Thread-May-8](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/85209-1-0-BDArmory-v0-8-2-%28AI-pilots-smarter-guards-etc%29-Dev-Thread-May-8)
